greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least factorial multiple of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
mathematica: Reap[Do[m = 1; While[an = m!; !IntegerQ[an/n], m++]; Print[n, " ", an]; Sow[an], {n, 1, 28}]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 04 2018 *)
With[{f=Range[30]!},Table[SelectFirst[f,Divisible[#,n]&],{n,30}]] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 25 2020 *)
program: a092495 n = fromJust $ find ((== 0) . (`mod` n)) $ a000142_list
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 02 2004
